about_the_game:
Turn-based game, through the role-playing way to stage a story of moral loss or human annihilation.
The story takes place in the medieval period of the western mainland, and has occupations such as swordsman, mage, and knight.
It mainly describes the conflicts and love and hatred between swordsmen, mages and knights.
The interplay between the maze and the battle makes the game full of fun.
A total of up to 4 character battles, the functions of the characters are different: output, control, auxiliary, nurse.
Start the game on the map to play the game and obtain equipment drawings, and obtain materials and equipment by killing monsters.
Upgrade skills or learn new skills by continuously releasing skills.
